cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB ciphering to an invalid enum 'invalid' will cause security configuration failure and prevent proper encryption setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting the maximum MIMO layers to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause physical layer configuration error and prevent proper MIMO operation.
du.explanation_zh: 將最大 MIMO 層數設定為無效值 'invalid' 會導致物理層配置錯誤，並阻止正確的 MIMO 操作。
